context: watts rising: a vision for a healthier watts abstract watts is a community in southeast los angeles that has faced systematic disinvestment, discrimination, and resource deprivation, resulting in health disparities across multiple domains including high rates of diabetes and obesity, high pollution burdens and limited employment opportunities. watts residents, almost exclusively people of color, (73% latinx and 25% black/african american), have a life expectancy twelve years lower than other parts of los angeles, largely due to decades of neglect the community has faced. this proposal builds
title: Watts Rising: A Vision for a Healthier Watts
